categories: Category:Enlisted personnel of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Privitt was an Imperial stationed at a communications outpost on the planet Vaal.

Having been stationed only a few weeks before the destruction of the first Death Star, Privitt was confused by the relaxed attitude of the two other officers there. He finally embraced their views, but was killed by a pack of aggressive hyenax who had followed Darth Vader, who was looking for a starship to take him off the planet, into the base.
